item.title: Cardinals elect new pope as white smoke seen at Vatican
item.description: A huge crowd in St. Peter's Square awaited the announcement of the name of the new Roman Catholic pope.

item.title: Trump unveils United Kingdom trade deal, first since 'reciprocal' tariff pause
item.description: President Trump imposed "reciprocal" tariffs on nearly all other countries, but quickly paused them to allow time to negotiate trade agreements with t...

item.title: Senate stablecoin vote outcome uncertain, after key Democrats back out
item.description: Senators face a key vote on a stablecoin regulation bill, but several Democrats who previously voted for the bill have backed out, putting its fate in...

item.title: Trump says he's pulling nomination of Ed Martin for top D.C. federal prosecutor
item.description: Martin is the second Trump nominee in as many days to be pulled after it appeared they would not have the Senate votes to be confirmed.

item.title: EU to launch dispute against U.S. tariffs as it sets out 95 billion euros in countermeasures
item.description: The EU has paused an initial set of retaliatory measures — a response to U.S. duties of 25% on steel and aluminum — to enable negotiations.
